Package org.hibernate.search.backend.lucene.search.sort.dsl

Interface LuceneSearchSortFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExtendedSearchSortFactory<LuceneSearchPredicateFactory>, SearchSortFactory
    public interface LuceneSearchSortFactory
extends ExtendedSearchSortFactory<LuceneSearchPredicateFactory>
    A factory for search sorts with some Lucene-specific methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      SortThenStep fromLuceneSort​(Sort luceneSort)
      Order elements by a given Lucene Sort.
      SortThenStep fromLuceneSortField​(SortField luceneSortField)
      Order elements by a given Lucene SortField.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.hibernate.search.engine.search.sort.dsl.SearchSortFactory

      • fromLuceneSortField

        SortThenStep fromLuceneSortField​(SortField luceneSortField)
        Order elements by a given Lucene SortField.
        Parameters:
        luceneSortField - A Lucene sort field.
        Returns:
